episodes.synopsis: Franky, Dazza and their friends try to scam their way onto disability, but with some of their other plans backfiring, they may qualify legitimately.
episodes.title: Disability

episodes.synopsis: Shazza is in labor and ready to give birth to her and Dazza's baby boy, but Dazza can't get her a ride to the hospital.
episodes.title: Pregnant

episodes.synopsis: Franky wins a motorcycle in a tough man competition, and fearing the losing biker gang will come after him, he takes a road trip to Melbourne.
episodes.title: Melbourne

episodes.synopsis: The Housos work for Habib in a sketchy roof insulation scheme set up by the new mayor of the Sunnyvale council.
episodes.title: Green Day

episodes.synopsis: Desperate for money, Shazza smuggles illegal steroids into Thailand for the Hunterz motorcycle gang and brings Franky, Kev and Kylie with her.
episodes.title: Thailand: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Shazza gets lost in Thailand with a boogie board full of illegal steroids, the Hunterz bikers think she has ripped them off.
episodes.title: Thailand: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Shazza and Kylie force Franky and Dazza to get jobs so they can buy dodgy pay TV boxes from the Sunnyvale Assassins.
episodes.title: Foxtel

episodes.synopsis: Franky needs a jumping castle for his son's first birthday party, and Dazza's Uncle Doug, fresh out of jail, promises to help him get one.
episodes.title: Uncle Doug

episodes.synopsis: It's Dazza's birthday, and his beer, smokes and pie cake have been stolen. Plus, when he and his friends steal the mayor's car, they learn a secret.
episodes.title: Birthday

episodes.synopsis: When Dazza loses a fancy dinner voucher he got for Shazza's birthday, he, Kev and Franky retrace their steps of the night before to find it.
episodes.title: Voucher

episodes.synopsis: When Beryl is arrested for defrauding Centerlink, the Housos riot, but that only gets Franky, Dazza, Kev and Reg a trip to jail.
episodes.title: Jailbreak

episodes.synopsis: When Shazza stops sleeping with Dazza, he joins the Hunterz biker gang, while Franky and Kev try a new scam they call "Robbing Hood."
episodes.title: Dazza the Bikie

episodes.synopsis: Franky and Kev go on a road trip to the desert when Pauly at the Fat Pizza shop tells Franky that his Uncle Fred has died and left him something.
episodes.title: Uncle Fred

episodes.synopsis: Dazza goes a little too far with his drug use and lands in rehab, but rehab turns out to be anything but conducive to kicking addictions.
episodes.title: Rehab

episodes.synopsis: When a reality TV show follows Cop Garry and Cop Richard as they patrol Sunnyvale, the Housos are eager to see themselves on television.
episodes.title: Cops

episodes.synopsis: The Junkies go crazy and steal everyone's stuff, so Shazza and Vanessa instigate a major new Centrelink scam for money to buy back their property.
episodes.title: Junkie

episodes.synopsis: Shazza and Franky scam a free vacation to Tokyo, Japan from the TV networks by pretending Abdul is their hairy, mentally challenged son.
episodes.title: Tokyo

episodes.synopsis: When Dazza and Kev become wealthy for being declared brain damaged, their girls hatch a plan to force them into marriage so they can share the loot.
episodes.title: Wedding

video.title: Housos
video.synopsis: This wild satire follows the misadventures of a group of friends living in an Australian housing project as they attempt scams and dodge the law.
